CpG Dinucleotides Stats¶

cpgStats is a C application to parse CpG Dinucleotides file and get a summary of statistics and bed file annotation. It can also compare two dinucleotide files to get intersection stats.

cpgStats QuickStart¶

Note

Before starting to run cpgStats please make sure input files are coordinate sorted.

0. Download¶

cpgStats can be downloaded from: github cpgStats

1. Compile¶

1.1. Release¶

Download and extract the code and compile it from cpgStats/Release path.

cd cpgStats/Release
make clean
make

1.2. Debug¶

For cases of code testing it is possible to compile a debug version code.

cd cpgStats/Debug
make clean
make

2. Run cpgStats¶

2.1. Get Summary Stats¶

2.1.1 From a zipped file¶
cpgStats -i file_cpg.txt.gz -z
2.1.2 From a unzipped file¶
cpgStats -i file_cpg.txt
2.1.3 Save stats in json file¶
cpgStats -i file_cpg.txt.gz -z -o stats.json

2.2. Annotate Bed File¶

cpgStats -i file_cpg.txt.gz -z -b promoters.sorted.bed -a promoters.annotated.bed

2.3. Intersection Stats¶

cpgStats -x first_file_cpg.txt.gz -y second_file_cpg.txt.gz -g

-g In case dinucleotide files are compressed.

3. Format files¶

3.1. Input CpG Dinucleotides Format. (Should be coordinate sorted.)¶

CONTIG POSITION CONTEXT (Reference) CONTEXT (Genotype Call) Phred Score Methylation (Mode Beta Distrib.) Methylation Deviation (SD Beta Distrib.) Info Cs & Ts. For Meth. Info Ts & Cs. For Meth. Info Ts,Cs, As non Info for Meth. All Info and non Info. For methylation. MC8 MC8 next by base
Contig Chromosome name. Position in the reference sequence. Dinucleotide base call according to reference. Dinucleotide base according to genotype call. Phred scaled probability that REF/ALT polymorphism exists. Methylation value according to Mode of Beta Distribution estimated from informative methylation counts. Standard Deviation of the methylation value. St. Dev of Beta Distribution. Informative Cs for methylation or Cs and Ts in case of CG/CC/GG. Informative Ts for methylation or Ts and As in case of CG/CC/GG. Informative Ts,Cs and non informative Cs for methylation or informative Cs,Ts,As and non informative Cs,Gs in case of CG/CC/GG. All base counts. Base counts non informative for methylation (ACGT) followed by informative for methylation (ACGT). Base counts non informative for methylation (ACGT) followed by informative for methylation (ACGT) next by base.

3.2. Input BED File Format. (Should be coordinate sorted.)¶

CONTIG START END EXTRA FIELD 1 ... EXTRA FIELD N
Contig Chromosome name. Start Position Last Position Extra optional field one ... Extra optional field N

3.3. Output annotated BED¶

CONTIG START END EXTRA FIELD 1 ... EXTRA FIELD N MEAN METHYLATION MEDIAN METHYLATION STANDARD DEVIATION METHYLATION CpG DINUCLEOTIDES HETEROZYGOUS DINUCLEOTIDES
Contig Chromosome name. Start Position Last Position Extra optional field one ... Extra optional field N Mean Methylation value of CpG Dinucleotides present in the window. Median Methylation value of CpG Dinucleotides present in the window. Standard Deviation methylation value of CpG Dinucleotides present in the window. Number of CpG Dinucleotides in the window. Number of CpG Dinucleotides heterozygous.
